sentences.en: Advances in technology have improved crop yields by over 30%.
sentences.cn: 科技的进步使庄稼产量提高了30%以上。

sentences.en: Britain needs to bridge the technology gap between academia and industry.
sentences.cn: 英国需要弥合学术界和企业界之间的技术差距。

sentences.en: Changes in technology may mean that once-valued skills are now redundant.
sentences.cn: 技术上的革新可能意味着曾经被重视的技术现在已变得多余。

sentences.en: Engineering and technology are disciplines distinct from one another and from science.
sentences.cn: 工程学和工艺学互不相同，也有别于自然学科。

sentences.en: His project is concerned with applying the technology to practical business problems.
sentences.cn: 他的项目是将这项技术应用于实际的商务问题。

sentences.en: It is easy to feel trampled by the relentless march of technology.
sentences.cn: 随着科技发展的日新月异，人们容易感到无所适从。

sentences.en: Many people are unwilling to embrace new technologies.
sentences.cn: 很多人不愿意接受新科技。

sentences.en: Many technical experts at the time had doubts about the technology.
sentences.cn: 当时，许多技术专家对那种工艺抱有疑问。

sentences.en: Modern technology makes moving money around much easier than it used to be.
sentences.cn: 现代科技使货币流动比以前便捷得多。

sentences.en: Our superior technology is our ace in the hole.
sentences.cn: 我们超众的技术是我们的法宝。

sentences.en: Please enclose your remittance, making cheques payable to Thames Valley Technology.
sentences.cn: 请附上汇款，支票收款人为泰晤士河谷科技公司。

sentences.en: Research and technology are said to be chronically underfunded.
sentences.cn: 据说为研究和技术方面提供的经费严重不足。

sentences.en: Science and technology have made major changes to the way we live.
sentences.cn: 科技极大地改变了我们的生活方式。

sentences.en: The company has responded sluggishly to these changes in technology.
sentences.cn: 该公司对这些技术上的变化反应迟缓。

sentences.en: The required technology is probably still two years off.
sentences.cn: 所需技术可能还要两年才能开发出来。

sentences.en: There have been major new developments in satellite technology.
sentences.cn: 卫星技术有了重大的新发展。

sentences.en: This device helps make virtual reality a more usable and accessible technology.
sentences.cn: 这一装置有助于使虚拟现实成为更可用、更便利的技术。

sentences.en: This shipyard is at the cutting edge of world shipbuilding technology.
sentences.cn: 该造船厂的造船技术处于世界最前沿。

sentences.en: What we are planning is cutting-edge technology never seen in Australia before.
sentences.cn: 我们正在开发的是一种在澳大利亚从未有过的尖端技术。
